name: Kristamata (English)
description:
Kristamata is a short RPG about two highschool students, Kenji and Kazuya, from Sierra Valley Highschool who are trying to save the world from an evil monster, Gorgon, from another dimension. 

Combat is not the most important thing in this game, you can easily skip encounters by avoiding contact with enemies., and the boss fights are easy. Consider this game to be a short story type game. 

This is a JRPG style game made with RPGMMV. It will only take about 45-60 minutes to finish this game, enjoy!
